name: Wind, Fight, Rewind
description:
Controls:

W A S D - move 

Shift = Dash

E - build and upgrade

Q - sell buildings of 75%

F - Winding Up the Turret

1, 2  - select buildings

Please leave feedback! Every feedback improves my day immensly.

I'm sorry but I couldn't add everything i wanted with the time I had, but I'll update the page and the game later when I get some sleep;
